changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE FUNCTION ruleform.ensure_valid_initial_state() RETURNS trigger AS 'com.chiralbehaviors.CoRE.meta.models.JobModelImpl.ensure_valid_initial_state' LANGUAGE javaU VOLATILE COST 100; ALTER FUNCTION ruleform.ensure_valid_initial_state() OWNER TO core;
